===============================

===============================

Vietnamese NLP Toolkit


* Free software: GNU General Public License v3
* Documentation: `https://underthesea.readthedocs.io <https://magizbox-underthesea.readthedocs-hosted.com/en/latest/>`_

Features
--------

* Sentiment Analysis
* Vietnamese Dictionary
